org.dgfoundation.amp.gpi.reports

Class GPIReportOutputBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.gpi.reports.GPIReportOutputBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GPIReport1Output1Builder, GPIReport1Output2Builder, GPIReport5aOutputBuilder, GPIReport5bOutputBuilder, GPIReport6OutputBuilder, GPIReport9bOutputBuilder

    public abstract class GPIReportOutputBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to transform a GeneratedReport to GPI Report Output (headers, report data, summary)
